title: These Three Remain
description: "…the last man in the world whom I could ever be prevailed on to marry." With those devastating words, Fitzwilliam Darcy�s proposal to Elizabeth Bennet is thoroughly rejected and his character wholly condemned. These Three Remain traces Darcy�s painful journey of self-discovery in his quest to become the man he always hoped be would be. A chance meeting with Elizabeth at his Derbyshire estate offers Darcy a new opportunity, but the activities of his nemesis, George Wickham, interfere once more in a way that may ruin everyone�s hopes for happiness.
author: Pamela Aidan
